Class ChopJob

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
eu.steffo.cleaver.logic.Job
eu.steffo.cleaver.logic.ChopJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ChopJob
extends Job
A Job that converts regular files into chopped (*.chp + *.cXX) files.
